description.summary: Recently joined as a trainee developer to develop and provide a solution for fully customized CMS which is serving 50+ Bangladeshi Online Newspaper.

name: DIU - NLP and Machine Learning Research LAB

description.summary: Acted as an R&D engineer in different principles.I developed remarkable word embedding models for our Bangla language in the LAB and also built a Bangla text summarization using Deep Learning Algorithm.
bulletPoint: Worked closely with the team of reseachers of the club to improve accuracy of word embedding models for Bengali language.
Used machine learning and deep learning models to develop and evaluate algorithms for improving performance of Text Summarization of Bengali language.
Built the research labâ€™s introductory website.

description.summary: I developed a rest API for Roomie that will show empty rooms in university buildings. This was project was given to us by the authority of DIU. I developed the rest API and my friend mushfiqus developed the android app
bulletPoint: First Teachers/Students have to register by their ID number which is given by University.
Then Teacher/Student can book the empty room for their extra classes. Teacher/student can update/delete their request.
Also, students/teachers can pre-book a room, if the selected room empty sometimes they will get a notification.

description.summary: Assisted the course teachers in Algorithms, Programming and Problem Solving , Simulation and Modeling and Artificial Intelligence course.
